sentences.en: A mink coat is available only to the privileged few.
sentences.cn: 貂皮大衣只有少数很有钱的人才买得起.

sentences.en: Awards by the emperor, grant mink 2,4 large satin.
sentences.cn: 受到皇上嘉奖, 赏赐貂皮2张、大缎4匹.

sentences.en: Dog, mink distemper, dog tiny virus and so on virulent diseases.
sentences.cn: 犬 、 水貂的犬瘟热 、 犬细小病毒等病毒性疾病.

sentences.en: Her shoulders were graced with mink and her fingers sparkled with diamonds.
sentences.cn: 肩上披着的貂皮衬托得她更加优雅，手上的钻戒则光彩夺目。

sentences.en: I don't want a mink coat!
I never saw such a gorgeous mink coat in all my life.
sentences.cn: 我一辈子也没见过这样华丽的貂皮大衣.

sentences.en: If I win a lot of money I'll buy you a mink coat.
sentences.cn: 要是我赢了许多钱,我给你买件貂皮大衣.

sentences.en: JULIE: I don't a mink coat! I want to see the world.
sentences.cn: 朱莉: 我不要貂皮大衣! 我要去见见世面.

sentences.en: She shanghaied him into buying her a mink coat.
sentences.cn: 她用诱骗的手段迫使他买给她一件貂皮大衣.

sentences.en: She was wearing a blue dress and a mink coat.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身蓝色的套装和一件貂皮大衣.

sentences.en: She wheedled him into buying her a mink coat.
sentences.cn: 她用甜言蜜语诱他买貂皮大衣给她.

sentences.en: This kind of mink coat is noBle and elegant.
sentences.cn: 这种貂皮大衣,高贵典雅.

sentences.en: Tom traded his genuine leather jacket for your mink coat.
sentences.cn: 汤姆用他的真皮夹克换了你的貂皮大衣.

sentences.en: You must have paid the earth for that mink coat!
sentences.cn: 买那件貂皮大衣,你一定花了大价钱.

sentences.en: You'll find love for the price ofa mink.
sentences.cn: 出一件貂皮大衣的价钱,你就可以找到爱.

trans.tran_en: a small animal with soft brown fur, or the very valuable fur of this animal which is used to make coats, hats etc
